name: Brigitte
description: Brigitte Lindholm has taken up arms to defend those in need of protection. She specializes in close-range attacks that heal and protect her nearby allies.

abilities.name: Repair Pack
abilities.description: Heals an ally for a short duration.

abilities.name: Whip Shot
abilities.description: Launch your flail forward to knock an enemy away from you.

abilities.name: Barrier Shield
abilities.description: Hold  to deploy a frontal energy barrier.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Available when Barrier Shield is deployed. Dash forward to knock back an enemy.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.description: Move faster and provide extra health to nearby allies.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Dealing damage to enemies heals nearby allies.

story: A Lindholm through and through, Brigitte’s aptitude for engineering is matched by her sense of honor. From her youth, Brigitte was inspired by the tales of valor she heard from her godfather, Reinhardt. When she came of age, she became the squire to his knight. The two have joined the new Overwatch, hoping to right the wrongs of the world.
